pullRequest.title: Pro log window minor simplifications
pullRequest.bodyText:
Few simplifications while researching NPE in pro log window.
Commits
commit 60c07f4
ProLogWindow simplifications, inline variables, dispose call and initialize method

commit 4e0b2a0
Simplify, remove 'level' parameter logging in ProLogUI message append, used only in error
logging and does not matter relative to any error.


Functional Changes

[] New map or map update
[] New Feature
[] Feature update or enhancement
[] Feature Removal
[x] Code Cleanup or refactor
[] Configuration Change
[] Problem fix:  
[] Other:

commit.message: ProLogWindow simplifications, inline variables, dispose call and initialize method

Simplify, remove 'level' parameter logging in ProLogUI message append, used only in error
logging and does not matter relative to any error.

nodes.bodyText: Site-Note: I'd agree that this is bad, but I'd really let any exception propagate in this case 🤷
